name: Twizzle Puzzle: Reptiles
description:
Twizzle Puzzle: Reptiles - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.
Your goal is to assemble a picture of cool reptiles that has been cut into an equal number of pieces.
Rotate the pieces to create the full picture, but think logically about the connections and solve the puzzle.
There are 50 levels to complete, and the challenge becomes increasingly difficult as you progress.
Enjoy a relaxing time connecting the pieces to create a beautiful picture of reptiles

In Twizzle Puzzle: Reptiles:

•50 levels
•Beautiful art
•Simple controls (mouse)
•Achievements
•Relaxing music
